channel.title: How do i make it so i can cook my fish on fire from logs?
channel.description:
Hello all,
I searched all over google but i can't find a decent cooking tutorial or something. I am adding a tutorial island and i just found out that i can't cook myy fishes on fire. Does anyone know how i can add this?

item.description:

Thanks for all help but i found it out already
